page.shortlink: api Xbasic api arrays of objects

description.p: As of the writing of this help topic, it is impossible to DIM an array of objects based on a class. The following code sample shows a work-around.
This example creates an array containing five SQL::TableInfo objects.

section.example: dim ti as SQL::TableInfo dim arr[5] as P arr[1] = ti for i = 2 to 5 arr[i] = ti.clone() next i
